subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The surging ninth-place Hurricanes are pressuring the three teams above them, the Rangers, the Sabres and the Canadiens, in the final push to the N.H.L. playoffs.
snippet: The surging ninth-place Hurricanes are pressuring the three teams above them, the Rangers, the Sabres and the Canadiens, in the final push to the N.H.L. playoffs.
